author: Jake Rudnitsky, Ilya Khrennikov
title: Moscow Tightens Lockdown With Digital Permits as Virus Spreads
description: Moscow Mayor Sergei Sobyanin tightened the lockdown on Russia’s capital, introducing a digital permit system for trips by vehicle this week after voluntary restrictions failed to curb travel and keep people off the streets.
content:
A pedestrian exits a subway as night falls in Moscow on April 2.
